conclusion: Understand how position and size of objects change with light source movement
Objects labeled A, B, C, and D positioned above slabs
Light source moves from top left to top right
Objects will change position relative to light source, moving up and down
Objects will change size, appearing larger or smaller depending on distance from light source
Objects A, B, C, and D are above slabs on the ground
Light source moves from top left to top right
Objects will move up and down
Objects will appear larger or smaller as they move relative to light source
Objects change position and size with light source movement
Objects appear larger as they move further from light source, smaller as they move closer
A, B, C, and D will move up and down and appear larger
